ValidationRule.description: Only System Adm can change the stage from contract signed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Contract Signed"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Enrolled"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "NSF"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Fess Done"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled") ), $Profile.Name = "Sales Rep" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ask the Underwriter or a System Administrator to change the Stage.
